aboutRoom: Contemporary styled in relaxed natural tones, this 30-square-metre guestroom boasts one king bed with feather pillows. A separate walk-in rain shower can be found in the spacious bathroom, while modern amenities include a 42-inch LCD TV with satellite channels, as well as high speed Internet.

Contemporary styled in relaxed natural tones, this 30-square-metre guestroom boasts two twin beds with feather pillows. A separate walk-in rain shower can be found in the spacious bathroom, while modern amenities include a 42-inch LCD TV with satellite channels, as well as high speed Internet.

Contemporary design and custom artwork create an inviting ambience in this 45-square-metre suite with its one king bed, city views, well-lit, over-sized work area, spa-inspired deep soak bathtub, separate rain shower, upgraded bath amenities and access to evening cocktail hours. Enjoy modern conveniences such as a 55-inch LCD TV and wired/wireless Internet access.

Contemporary design and custom artwork create an inviting ambience in this 70-square-metre suite with its one king bed, city views, well-lit, over-sized work area, deep soak bathtub, separate rain shower, upgraded bath amenities and access to evening cocktail hours. Enjoy modern conveniences such as a 55-inch LCD TV and high speed Internet access.
